item.description:
Come learn backcountry and mountain day hiking & camping in New
England. There will be lectures and small group Q&A with Boston
Chapter leaders as well as hands-on opportunities with
equipment. Topics include heat management and clothing, group
hiking techniques, energy management and nutrition, physical
conditioning, above tree-line hiking, weather, camping
techniques, equipment, food prep and more. There will be
weekend day hike trips throughout the spring offered
exclusively or preferentially to participants in this class so
you can put your learning in practice. There will also be a
backpacking weekend in June.

Online registration with PayPal payment available
Go to http://www.hbbostonam...
And click on Beginner Spring Hiking Program 2010 (More info >)

Cost $45-$55 for all 5 sessions
$20-$25 for backpacking sessions only

For more info, see the website above or contact or call Bob
Knudsen (rknudsen@rcn.com or call 781-491-0698 before 10 pm).

The program is sponsored by the AMC Boston Chapter's Hiking and
Backpacking Committee.

All questions should be directed to:
Bob Knudsen
Boston AMC
Hiking and Backpacking Committee

RSVP if you sign up for this program. You can then identify other Meetup members who attend this off-trail event and possibly meet for dinner or coffee.
item.name: Boston Chapter Spring Hiking Program (SHP)
